channel.title: Help please, urgent

item.title: Help please, urgent
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:8, topic:472514”][quote author=mr arrows95 link=topic=590306.msg4179779#msg4179779 date=1355370416]

<html>
<head>
<title>Divinity - Webclient</title>
<meta name="description" content=" Description of your rsps">
<meta name="Plox/killaaron" content="Made by Plox and Killaaron">
<style type="text/css">
  html {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  body {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 0;
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif;
    background: black;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  td {
    text-align: center;
  }
  #tb {
  margin: auto;
  width: 766px;
  height: 90px;
 }
  .minheight {
    width: 0;
    height: 503px;
  }
  applet, object, embed, comment {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }
  #gametable {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #gamecell {
    width: 5000px;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #gameframe {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #menu {
    margin: auto;
    width: 728px;
    height: 27px;
    font-size: 12px;
    background: transparent url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/332758221.png') left top no-repeat;
  }
  #menu div {
    float: left;
    padding: 4px;
  }
  #menubox {
    padding: 0 0 5px;
  }
  #home, #forums, #guides, #accmanagement, #report, #donate {
    float: left;
    height: 19px;
    line-height: 17px;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    color: #e8d800;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-decoration: none;
    background-image: url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/1528357857.png');
  }
  #home, #forums, #guides, #report, #donate {
    width: 101px;
    background-position: left top;
  }
  #accmanagement {
  width: 163px;
  background-position: -110px top;
  }
  #accmanagement:hover {
  color: black;
  background-position: -110px bottom;
  }
  #home:hover, #forums:hover, #guides:hover, #report:hover, #donate:hover {
    color: black;
    background-position: left bottom;
  }
  #textbar {
    position: absolute;
    right: 47px;
    top: 2px;
    width: 86px;
    height: 15px;
    line-height: 15px;
    border: none;
    padding: 0 0 0 1px;
    background: white;
   }
</style>
<div id="menubox">
<div id="menu">
<div>
  
<a id="home" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php">Home</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php">Home</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://www.divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?action=forum">Forums</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?topic=19.0">Donate</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinity2.netii.net/index.php?board=18.0">Download</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/vote/#?step=1">Vote</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?action=register">Register now</a>
  
</div>
</div>
</div>
</head>
<body>
<div align="center">
********************APPLET CODE HERE********************
</div>
</body>
</html>

there ya go
and i suggest putting all the css in a separate file but its up to you

I figured it out, but how can i make a vote and Donate page?

You’re going from basic HTML to MySQL and PHP, I think maybe you should look up some tutorials, or some generals guides.
[/quote]

Not necessarily, it depends what types of vote and donate pages he wants. If he wants a page with a donate button, that’s basic HTML. If he want’s a vote page with the links, that’s still basic HTML.[/quote]
It sounds like he wants a complete donation system, which IS MySQL and PHP.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, urgent

item.description:

  #home, #forums, #guides, #accmanagement, #report, #donate {

  color: black;
  background-position: -110px bottom;

  #home:hover, #forums:hover, #guides:hover, #report:hover, #donate:hover {
    color: black;

  #textbar {
    position: absolute;
    right: 47px;

    line-height: 15px;

    padding: 0 0 0 1px;
    background: white;

</style>

<div id="menu">

item.title: Help please, urgent
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Use the same design as you did for the header and put the content in the body. If your making multiple pages you can do what a lot of people(including myself) do.
Make the header its own file called header.php which in your case would be:

<html>
<head>
<title>Divinity - Webclient</title>
<meta name="description" content=" Description of your rsps">
<meta name="Plox/killaaron" content="Made by Plox and Killaaron">
<style type="text/css">
  html {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  body {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 0;
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif;
    background: black;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  td {
    text-align: center;
  }
  #tb {
  margin: auto;
  width: 766px;
  height: 90px;
 }
  .minheight {
    width: 0;
    height: 503px;
  }
  applet, object, embed, comment {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }
  #gametable {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #gamecell {
    width: 5000px;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #gameframe {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
  #menu {
    margin: auto;
    width: 728px;
    height: 27px;
    font-size: 12px;
    background: transparent url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/332758221.png') left top no-repeat;
  }
  #menu div {
    float: left;
    padding: 4px;
  }
  #menubox {
    padding: 0 0 5px;
  }
  #home, #forums, #guides, #accmanagement, #report, #donate {
    float: left;
    height: 19px;
    line-height: 17px;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    color: #e8d800;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-decoration: none;
    background-image: url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/1528357857.png');
  }
  #home, #forums, #guides, #report, #donate {
    width: 101px;
    background-position: left top;
  }
  #accmanagement {
  width: 163px;
  background-position: -110px top;
  }
  #accmanagement:hover {
  color: black;
  background-position: -110px bottom;
  }
  #home:hover, #forums:hover, #guides:hover, #report:hover, #donate:hover {
    color: black;
    background-position: left bottom;
  }
  #textbar {
    position: absolute;
    right: 47px;
    top: 2px;
    width: 86px;
    height: 15px;
    line-height: 15px;
    border: none;
    padding: 0 0 0 1px;
    background: white;
   }
</style>
<div id="menubox">
<div id="menu">
<div>
  
<a id="home" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php">Home</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php">Home</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://www.divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?action=forum">Forums</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?topic=19.0">Donate</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinity2.netii.net/index.php?board=18.0">Download</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/vote/#?step=1">Vote</a>
<a id="forums" target="_blank" href="http://divinityv2.netii.net/index.php?action=register">Register now</a>
  
</div>
</div>
</div>
</head>

and in every other page you can use php to call it so its not taking up so much space for ex;

<? include ("header.php"); ?>

so a normal page for you would look like:

<?php
include ("header.php");
?>
<body>
content here
</body
</html>

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, urgent
item.dc:creator: @T0rvascape T0rvascape
item.description:
@T0rvascape wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:4, topic:472514”][code]

Divinity - Webclient html { margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } body { margin: 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; font-size: 0; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif; background: black; width: 100%; height: 100%; } td { text-align: center; } #tb { margin: auto; width: 766px; height: 90px; } .minheight { width: 0; height: 503px; } applet, object, embed, comment { margin: 0; padding: 0; } #gametable { margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } #gamecell { width: 5000px; height: 100%; } #gameframe { margin: 0; padding: 0; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; } #menu { margin: auto; width: 728px; height: 27px; font-size: 12px; background: transparent url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/332758221.png') left top no-repeat; } #menu div { float: left; padding: 4px; } #menubox { padding: 0 0 5px; } #home, #forums, #guides, #accmanagement, #report, #donate { float: left; height: 19px; line-height: 17px; margin: 0; padding: 0; color: #e8d800; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; background-image: url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/1528357857.png'); } #home, #forums, #guides, #report, #donate { width: 101px; background-position: left top; } #accmanagement { width: 163px; background-position: -110px top; } #accmanagement:hover { color: black; background-position: -110px bottom; } #home:hover, #forums:hover, #guides:hover, #report:hover, #donate:hover { color: black; background-position: left bottom; } #textbar { position: absolute; right: 47px; top: 2px; width: 86px; height: 15px; line-height: 15px; border: none; padding: 0 0 0 1px; background: white; }

Home
Home
Forums
Donate
Download
Vote
Register now

********************APPLET CODE HERE********************
[/code]

there ya go
and i suggest putting all the css in a separate file but its up to you[/quote]

I figured it out, but how can i make a vote and Donate page?

item.title: Help please, urgent
item.dc:creator: @T0rvascape T0rvascape
item.description:
@T0rvascape wrote:

can someone help me with this, how would I get my webclient actually in this code.

Divinity - Webclient html { margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } body { margin: 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; font-size: 0; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif; background: black; width: 100%; height: 100%; } td { text-align: center; } #tb { margin: auto; width: 766px; height: 90px; } .minheight { width: 0; height: 503px; } applet, object, embed, comment { margin: 0; padding: 0; } #gametable { margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } #gamecell { width: 5000px; height: 100%; } #gameframe { margin: 0; padding: 0; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; } #menu { margin: auto; width: 728px; height: 27px; font-size: 12px; background: transparent url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/332758221.png') left top no-repeat; } #menu div { float: left; padding: 4px; } #menubox { padding: 0 0 5px; } #home, #forums, #guides, #accmanagement, #report, #donate { float: left; height: 19px; line-height: 17px; margin: 0; padding: 0; color: #e8d800; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; background-image: url('http://www.rspscoding.org/upload/archive/1528357857.png'); } #home, #forums, #guides, #report, #donate { width: 101px; background-position: left top; } #accmanagement { width: 163px; background-position: -110px top; } #accmanagement:hover { color: black; background-position: -110px bottom; } #home:hover, #forums:hover, #guides:hover, #report:hover, #donate:hover { color: black; background-position: left bottom; } #textbar { position: absolute; right: 47px; top: 2px; width: 86px; height: 15px; line-height: 15px; border: none; padding: 0 0 0 1px; background: white; }
